polish: Chcę siedzieć między corką i synem
english: I want to sit between my daughter and my son
I'm waiting in front of the house
I gave water to my thirsty cat
I gave water to this boy
Their car is in the garage
I'm going by this fast train
The cat's sleeping under the table
The cow is eating grass in a field
We have a skeleton in the closet!
Do you have a snot in your nose?

polish: Musimy rozmawiać o tym nieuczciwym gościu
english: We have to talk about this dishonest guest
I'm washing myself with that white soap
I'm washing myself with this clean water
I'm thinking about your naked body!

polish: Nie siedź na tej zimnej podłodze!
english: Don't sit on this cold floor!

polish: Oni pozwalają waszemu dziecku pić kawę!
english: They allow your child to drink coffee!

polish: Poza pracą, nic go nie interesuje
english: Besides work, he's not interested in anything

I work in my own bar

In summer, we go on holiday
